headline.main: Goering Inspects Axis Air Power in Italy; Stepped-Up Drive Seen From His Rome Visit

lead_paragraph: BERNE, Switzerland, Feb. 2 -- A communique issued in Rome today only to the foreign press, and received here, said Reich Marshal Hermann Goering, commander in chief of the German Air Force, has been in Italy since last Tuesday on an inspection tour of air bases in Southern Italy and Sicily and for conferences with Italian and German military leaders in Italy.
abstract: Goering Inspects Axis air power in Italy
